11#ifndef VPX_VPX_MEM_INCLUDE_VPX_MEM_INTRNL_H_
12#define VPX_VPX_MEM_INCLUDE_VPX_MEM_INTRNL_H_
13#include "./vpx_config.h"
14
15#define ADDRESS_STORAGE_SIZE sizeof(size_t)
16
17#ifndef DEFAULT_ALIGNMENT
18#if defined(VXWORKS)
19/*default addr alignment to use in calls to vpx_* functions other than
20 * vpx_memalign*/
21#define DEFAULT_ALIGNMENT 32
22#else
23#define DEFAULT_ALIGNMENT (2 * sizeof(void *)) /* NOLINT */
24#endif
25#endif
26
27/*returns an addr aligned to the byte boundary specified by align*/
28#define align_addr(addr, align) \
29 (void *)(((size_t)(addr) + ((align)-1)) & ~(size_t)((align)-1))
30
31#endif // VPX_VPX_MEM_INCLUDE_VPX_MEM_INTRNL_H_
32
